meanings.definition: A cocktail made with rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint.
meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone enjoyed sipping on refreshing mojitos.
meanings.sent2: The bartender mixed the mojitos perfectly, balancing the flavors.
meanings.sent3: The mint in the mojitos danced on my taste buds like a lively party.
meanings.sent4: The cool breeze felt like a mojito, refreshing and invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the mojitos sparkled in the sunlight, tempting everyone around.
